result.execSummary:
The defendant Gonzalo Diaz was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Cash Bond previously posted in the amount of $250.00 has been applied.  The remaining balance is to be paid directly to the Waushara County Clerk of Court within 60 days or establish a payment plan.  Failure to pay may result in suspension of your driver's license, tax intercept, a civil judgment being entered against you, a warrant being issued for your arrest for contempt and/or the debt being turned over to a collection agency.
Complete ID process with the Sheriff's Department.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Gonzalo Diaz

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Case Called @ 2:45 PM: Defendant Gonzalo Diaz in court.  Scott C. Blader appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Enrique Soria present as Interpreter.  Oath administered at previous hearing today.   Complaint Stated - Advised of offense and minimum/maximum penalty.  Receipt Admitted - Reading Waived.  Advised of right of Counsel.  Def wants counsel.  Employed with earnings discussed.  Def requests to speak with the State prior to deciding on counsel issue.  Off Record for Def to speak with the DA.  Back of Record at 2:55 PM:  Def has chosen to plead as charged with simple costs.  State moves for DRI of companion 15TR-378.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and expertise.  Voluntary waiver of counsel accepted by Court.  Defendant advised of minimum/maximum penalty.  Plea colloquy entertained.  Collateral consequences explained. Chapter 950 compliance addressed.  Plea GP:  Court accepts plea and enters JOC.  No Statement offered by Def.  The Court:  Accepts resolution and imposes Court Costs only - bond to be applied - 60 DTP any Bal or PP.  Hispanic Appeal Rights Given.  15TR-378 also DRI.

ADDRESS INFO for Gonzalo Diaz
Current: 176 Co Rd G, Nekoosa, WI 54457   (Effective: 04-07-2015)
Prior: 253 Buehler Ave, Nekoosa, WI 54457
No operation of any motor vehicles whatsoever.

Case Called @ 2:50 PM: Defendant Gonzalo Diaz in court.  Defendant appears with a relative today that can Interpret for him.  Scott C. Blader appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Complaint Stated - Advised of offense and minimum/maximum penalty.  DA serves a copy of the Complaint.  Receipt Admitted - Reading Waived.  Def confirms that he does not have a valid DL.  AIA Scheduled - NOH Given.  Court enters Riverside Ruling in favor of the State and probable cause finding as to each count alleged within the complaint.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 21, 2015 at 02:45 pm.

citations.chargeDescr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)
